Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a problem involving people who need to communicate over a distance.
The student can draw a string telephone that includes cups and a string, representing the use of sound to communicate.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing how sound travels through the string to communicate information.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone that help in sending and receiving sound signals.
The student can show only using the materials provided, such as showing cups and string in the drawing.
The student can represent how the string telephone enables communication over a distance.
The student can depict how this device is a solution to communicate when far apart, highlighting the importance of the technology.
